meta.track_condition: Dirt: Fast, Turf: Firm, All Weather: Fast

selections.name: The Town
selections.reason: Brad Cox/Irad Ortiz Jr. combination. Showed strong speed (98) on dirt debut, bred well for turf (Sire Win Win Win 12% Turf). The class of the field.

selections.name: Nickel C
selections.reason: Proven turf form at this level with a solid 76 speed figure last out. Consistent runner.

selections.name: Coach Kain
selections.reason: Drops from MSW company to Maiden Claiming. Casse barn is dangerous with this move.

selections.name: Vacationer
selections.reason: First-time starter for Brad Cox/WinStar Farm. Dangerous pedigree and connections.

danger_horse.name: Coach Kain
danger_horse.reason: Significant class drop often wakes up Casse runners.

selections.name: Starship Aspen
selections.reason: Clear standout on figures (68-72). Finished 2nd last out and maintains Javier Castellano. Looks ready to graduate.

selections.name: La Cyber
selections.reason: Consistent runner with a 62 speed figure last out. The main threat to the top pick.

selections.name: Game Changer Jolie
selections.reason: Gets Irad Ortiz Jr. which is a huge jockey upgrade. Should improve.

selections.name: Jessica's Dream
selections.reason: Capable of hitting the board on best effort.

selections.name: Camm's Princess
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz Jr. aboard. Consistent speed figures (70s) and finished 2nd last out. Fits perfectly here.

selections.name: U Know When U Know
selections.reason: Coming off a win. In good form and handles the surface well.

selections.name: Whirlwind
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last out. Draws the rail and should save ground.

selections.name: Smooth Claret
selections.reason: Speed figure of 109 (pace adjusted?) in history suggests back class. Dangerous if she wakes up.

danger_horse.name: U Know When U Know
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is dangerous to oppose in low-level claimers.

selections.name: Third Kiss
selections.reason: Massive class drop from MSW to Maiden Claiming $17,500. Riley Mott/Jorge Ruiz. The one to beat.

selections.name: Souffle On Fire
selections.reason: Saffie Joseph/Irad Ortiz combo. Consistent at this level (3rd last out).

selections.name: Lilys Back
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last out. Knocking on the door.

selections.name: Iliana
selections.reason: Sisterson barn. Can improve off the layoff.

danger_horse.name: Souffle On Fire
danger_horse.reason: High percentage connections and consistent form.

selections.name: Blazing Bucchero
selections.reason: Drops from $25k claiming to $12.5k. Irad Ortiz Jr. takes the mount. Speed figure 110 (best in field).

selections.name: Proud American
selections.reason: Won last out. Good current form.

selections.name: Without Pretence
selections.reason: Back class. Drops in for a tag.

selections.name: Dogwood Crossing
selections.reason: Consistent check earner.

selections.name: Lady Rockula
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz Jr. takes the mount. Consistent form (3rd last out). Speed figure 98 fits.

selections.name: All I Do
selections.reason: First time starter for Saffie Joseph (20% with debut). Good workout pattern.

selections.name: Turkish Pistachio
selections.reason: 4th last out but has shown flashes of speed.

selections.name: Quality Of Essence
selections.reason: Johnny V up. Outside post is decent for this distance.

selections.name: My Voodoo Doll
selections.reason: Mark Casse/Irad Ortiz Jr. Speed figure 119 is tops. 3rd last out in similar company.

selections.name: Souper Attentive
selections.reason: Won last out on synthetic. Translates well to turf. Casse/Velazquez.

selections.name: Win With Faith
selections.reason: Consistent runner. 3rd last out. Castellano aboard.

selections.name: Java Buzz
selections.reason: D'Angelo barn. Can close late.

danger_horse.name: Souper Attentive
danger_horse.reason: Winning form and high class rating (116).

selections.name: Rockies Balboa
selections.reason: Impressive MSW win last out. Romans/Alvarado. Looks like he has upside.

selections.name: All To Win
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz Jr. aboard. Crichton barn. Should improve off recent form.

selections.name: Winplaceandshow
selections.reason: Won MOC last out. Has early speed.

selections.name: Hawk
selections.reason: Won MOC last out. Zayas rides.

danger_horse.name: All To Win
danger_horse.reason: Jockey upgrade to Irad is significant.

selections.name: Ashima
selections.reason: Class of the field (120 Speed). Irad Ortiz Jr. retains the mount. 3rd last out in tough company.

selections.name: I Love Venezuela
selections.reason: Consistent runner. 2nd last out. 109 Speed figure.

selections.name: Show Off
selections.reason: Joe Bravo aboard. 5/1 odds offer value underneath.

selections.name: Oshala
selections.reason: Capable of hitting the board.

danger_horse.name: I Love Venezuela
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent and could upset if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Just For Luck
selections.reason: Rick Dutrow/Irad Ortiz Jr. Drops into Starter Allowance. 3rd last out. Strong late kick.

selections.name: Two Beers By Ten
selections.reason: Mike Maker on turf. 2nd last out. Consistent figures (112 Speed).

selections.name: Canuto
selections.reason: Has speed. Castellano aboard. Rail draw.

selections.name: Back In The Saddle
selections.reason: Joe Bravo rides. Price play.

danger_horse.name: Two Beers By Ten
danger_horse.reason: Maker turf runners are dangerous, especially off a near-miss.
